instructions:
##Topics for proposing talks/workshops/tutorials for ReactFoo Delhi:We are accepting proposals for: 
1. Full talks -- 40 mins duration 
2. Crisp talks -- 20 mins duration 
3. Birds of Feather (BOF) sessions 
4. Tutorials (90 mins duration) 5. Hands-on workshops -- of 3-6 hours duration -- where participants follow instructors on their laptops.
